page.text: The draconian looms over you, flushed, breathing heavily as she lets out a low growl "You, I've never felt this way before." she says and then a little shiver runs through her afore she declares...what it is she wants.

choice.text: #..i want to be your food, i want to feed myself to you
#..I want your sexy body, churning in my balls
#..I want you inside me, you belong in my ass
#I want you to debase me, let me crawl into your ass

page.text: You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.
Well a tumble with a sexy draconian sounds like a good idea to you. Question is who is going to be on the receiving end...
You express your agreement to be screwed

choice.text: *swallow her the rest of the way*

page.text: You feel your gut stretching and filling out with her body as you tip her legs into the air, feeling her grinding her hips against the inside of your throat as you swallow her down steadily. choice.text: $Well satisfied now food? you're all held in a belly, ready to be digested

page.text: The draconian lets out a growl but it turns swiftly into a moan as you tease her and she squirms "...yes, ready to be digested.." she really doesn't second guess her decision now, she's going all the way and so you feel happy to fulfil her goals. choice.text: *treat her like the food she is*

page.text: The draconian groans and squirms and churns inside you for a seeming age. The sensations of her form stretching and pushing against your insides toe curlingly exquisite at containing and claiming so mighty a predator as your willing meal. Gradually her form is conquered by your digestive powers, ground down into mush inside your belly. The draconian a deliciously satisfying meal for you, and one you're happy to accomodate. Once she's liquidated its not that long to absorb her entirely, her body putting up no more resistance and soon your gut shrinks down to nothing.
